observation.value: grew greater than 100,000 colonies of Klebsiella

td.content: s:58 YO white m negotiator presents with 3 weeks history of worsening Kidney. Patient does not smoke he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 191 cm, Weight 60.7 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Urine culture grew greater than 100,000 colonies of Klebsiella a:Pyelonephritis p:administered trimethoprim - 160 mg 2xday x 10 d, BACTRIM - 1 DS 2xday x 10 d, performed Urine culture, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
